TopicTitle: Emissive for engine makes it disappear in Unity

Articles.Content: Title says it. o.o Why. I use part tools .23 also tried on unity 4.3.4 and 4.1.2
Nevermind, I dunno what happened, I reinstalled unity 4.1.2 and part tools too. There's the problem methinks.

Emissives and Unity 4.3 and above do not (currently) get on

Unity 4.2.2 is the latest version which still works with Emissive animations
Given that 0.23.5 is based on Unity 4.3.3, gotta hope that the (assumed) 0.24 PartTools package will resolve this since Squad would also need to 'build' using it.
